text: Pamela Sue Evette (born August 28, 1967) is an American politician and businesswoman. Since 2019, she is the 93rd lieutenant governor of South Carolina. She serves as lieutenant governor under Governor Henry McMaster. She is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Businesspeople from South Carolina Category:Lieutenant Governors of South Carolina Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Pamela Evette
